EmailTemplate.name: 202009_Global_RMU_Grant-automation_Email.Grant's Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sensors Follow-up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
My name is Grant and I’m the product line director for Honeywell’s sensor portfolio. I am humbled and excited that you are considering our sensors for your next project.
To help us best serve you, please take a minute to tell us a little more about your inquiry:
- What is your role? - What is the application? - Is this a new application or a replacement in an existing application? - Is your question technical (product selection / data sheet) or transactional (quote / lead time)?
Thanks for your time.
Grant Lodden
